ðŸ“– Summary: Alice is an open-source AI desktop assistant that offers voice interaction, memory & context awareness, vision capabilities, and computer use tools. It allows users to interact with their computer through voice commands, leveraging function calling and customizable settings for a personalized AI experience. Alice is built with Vue.js, Vite, and Electron.
